item.title: Worli is the trendy spot in Mumbai
item.description:
Worli, situated at the entrance of South Mumbai, is gaining popularity as Mumbai’s top luxury neighborhood. The Park, a property development located in this central area, generated over â‚¹250 crore in a single weekend, according to developer Lodha Group. Source: Lodha Group. Mrs. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, prospective President and Brand Ambassador for The Park, a 17-acre residential project by the Lodha Group. Lodha states that Worli has transformed into a business center with numerous offices and corporations headquartered there...
